channel.title: Please Read .:Server Issues:
channel.description:
Hey, thanks for reading
I have my own server and i was just wondering ...whenever anyone connects to it, i can see them appear but then a few moments after they just disconnect, and on their screen all it says is 'please wait - loading'...
Please post any help or suggestions
Thanks - Michael :)

item.title: Please Read .:Server Issues:
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

if it’s a delta and people are connecting with mopar, there’s your problem.

most servers are anti-mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Please Read .:Server Issues:
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Have You Got A Really Good Internet Connection, If Not. Theres Your Problem

Read full topic
